code: import{getType}from'typesafe-actions';import{updateState}from'../utils/Reducer';import{TourActions}from'../actions/TourActions';export var INITIAL_TOUR_STATE={activeTour:undefined,activeStop:undefined};var tour=function tour(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_TOUR_STATE;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case getType(TourActions.endTour):return updateState(state,{activeTour:undefined,activeStop:undefined});case getType(TourActions.setStop):{return updateState(state,{activeStop:action.payload});}case getType(TourActions.startTour):return updateState(state,{activeTour:action.payload.info,activeStop:action.payload.stop});default:return state;}};export default tour;
